FROM ubuntu:16.04

RUN apt-get update && apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y \
    mono-devel \
    ca-certificates-mono \
    nuget && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;

# make sure we have nuget 2.12+ (in case there's an older cached docker image)
RUN apt-key adv --keyserver keyserver.ubuntu.com --recv-keys 3FA7E0328081BFF6A14DA29AA6A19B38D3D831EF
RUN echo "deb http://download.mono-project.com/repo/debian wheezy main" | tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/mono-xamarin.list
RUN apt-get update && apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y nuget && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;

RUN apt-get update && apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y unzip && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;
